metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24585 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the component /core/admin/comment.php of PluXml v5.8.7 allows attackers to execute arbitrary web scripts or HTML via a crafted payload in the author parameter.

criterions.comment: pluxml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
